casebody.data:
John MEYER, Appellant
v.
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole and John J. Talabar, Esq., Board Secretary, Appellees No. 29 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. November 1, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 1st day of November, 2018, the Motion to Dismiss for Mootness is GRANTED.
